items.title: Introduction
items.description:
An open-source UI component library for building high-quality, accessible
	design systems and web apps.

items.title: Getting started
items.description: A quick tutorial to get you up and running with Radix Primitives.

items.title: Accessibility
items.description:
Radix Primitives follow the WAI-ARIA authoring practices guidelines and are
	tested in a wide selection of modern browsers and commonly used assistive
	technologies.

items.title: Releases
items.description: Radix Primitives releases and their changelogs.

items.title: Styling
items.description:
Radix Primitives are unstyled—and compatible with any styling solution—giving
	you complete control over styling.

items.title: Animation
items.description:
Animate Radix Primitives with CSS keyframes or the JavaScript animation
	library of your choice.

items.title: Composition
items.description:
Use the `asChild` prop to compose Radix's functionality onto alternative
	element types or your own React components.

items.title: Server-side rendering
items.description:
Radix Primitives can be rendered on the server. However, Primitives in React
	versions less than 18 rely on hydration for ids.

items.title: Accordion
items.description:
A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal an
	associated section of content.

items.title: Alert Dialog
items.description:
A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a
	response.

items.title: Aspect Ratio
items.description: Displays content within a desired ratio.

items.title: Avatar
items.description: An image element with a fallback for representing the user.

items.title: Checkbox
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

items.title: Collapsible
items.description: An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel.

items.title: Context Menu
items.description:
Displays a menu located at the pointer, triggered by a right click or a long
	press.

items.title: Dialog
items.description:
A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window,
	rendering the content underneath inert.

items.title: Dropdown Menu
items.description:
Displays a menu to the user—such as a set of actions or functions—triggered by
	a button.

items.title: Form
items.description: Collect information from your users using validation rules.

items.title: Hover Card
items.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

items.title: Label
items.description: Renders an accessible label associated with controls.

items.title: Menubar
items.description:
A visually persistent menu common in desktop applications that provides quick
	access to a consistent set of commands.

items.title: Navigation Menu
items.description: A collection of links for navigating websites.

items.title: One-Time Password Field
items.description:
A group of single-character text inputs to handle one-time password
	verification.

items.title: Password Toggle Field
items.description:
A password input field with an integrated button to toggle the value's
	visibility.

items.title: Popover
items.description: Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a button.

items.title: Progress
items.description:
Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task, typically
	displayed as a progress bar.

items.title: Radio Group
items.description:
A set of checkable buttons—known as radio buttons—where no more than one of
	the buttons can be checked at a time.

items.title: Scroll Area
items.description: Augments native scroll functionality for custom, cross-browser styling.

items.title: Select
items.description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from—triggered by a button.

items.title: Separator
items.description: Visually or semantically separates content.

items.title: Slider
items.description: An input where the user selects a value from within a given range.

items.title: Switch
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

items.title: Tabs
items.description:
A set of layered sections of content—known as tab panels—that are displayed
	one at a time.

items.title: Toast
items.description: A succinct message that is displayed temporarily.

items.title: Toggle
items.description: A two-state button that can be either on or off.

items.title: Toggle Group
items.description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off.

items.title: Toolbar
items.description:
A container for grouping a set of controls, such as buttons, toggle groups or
	dropdown menus.

items.title: Tooltip
items.description:
A popup that displays information related to an element when the element
	receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it.

items.title: Accessible Icon
items.description: Makes icons accessible by adding a label.

items.title: Direction Provider
items.description: Wraps your app to provide global reading direction.

items.title: Portal
items.description: Renders a React subtree in a different part of the DOM.

items.title: Slot
items.description: Merges its props onto its immediate child.

items.title: Visually Hidden
items.description: Hides content from the screen in an accessible way.
